Summary: 4 orange color lights moved independently of each other but tight formation
divs: Sighting Details11:28 p.m. est I was outside my studio and looked up to check out the stars ( I do that alot )then I saw 4 seperate orange colored lights tight formation 2 by 2 high above lights seems to intensify must have come from the southeast but when I saw them they were directly overhead....no sound....moved indepently ( like a nat )of each other then one of the lights converged with the other two....then seperated...was not normal headed north by north east towards summit and portage counties....no sound...I have never seen anything like that before....please check it out. It was twice as bright as mars when mars was at it closest point to earth a month or so ago... Lost sight as objects moved toward the north by northeast sorry I am still shaking and still have goose bumps from the event.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in North Canton
There were no other sightings in North Canton on or around February 27th 2008
